subject: Urgent Notice.
body:
M/S, 
We have received reports from your agent Danso Duku this morning that, after giving him all the necessary information you requested yesterday, you still disobeyed to supply your personal information to cross check the proof of ownership of your consignment, that's the due diligence, it is a routine exercise for passengers and their goods needs to be examined before release. This consignment has been ON-HOLD here with the Airport Cargo Service unit for the period of one (1) month. 
We, hereby request you to comply with our instruction by sending your personal information immediately, this is to enable us to reconfirm the proof of ownership of your consignment, and failure to comply today, your consignment will be confiscated. 
We have supplied all the necessary details to your agent, therefore we do entertain any question at this juncture. 
Once again, you are required to send to us, your full name, contact address, your phone number and your identity, to reconfirm with the information labeled on the consignment and to avoid releasing goods to a wrong person. 
Yours faithfully, 
Johnny Chamblee. 
(Cargo Manager), 
Airport Cargo Service 
Email: usnyc.cargo-partner.jfkairport@usa.com

subject: Re: Urgent Notice.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the necessary information required for the release of my goods. I appreciate your diligence in ensuring that the process is carried out correctly.

Could you please provide more details on how I can securely send my personal information to reconfirm the proof of ownership of my goods? I want to make sure that everything is done accurately and efficiently.

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Urgent Notice.
body:

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

subject: Re: Urgent Notice.
body:
M/S, 
We have received reports from your agent Danso Duku this morning that, after giving him all the necessary information you requested yesterday, you still disobeyed to supply your personal information to cross check the proof of ownership of your consignment, that's the due diligence, it is a routine exercise for passengers and their goods needs to be examined before release. This consignment has been ON-HOLD here with the Airport Cargo Service unit for the period of one (1) month. 
We, hereby request you to comply with our instruction by sending your personal information immediately, this is to enable us to reconfirm the proof of ownership of your consignment, and failure to comply today, your consignment will be confiscated. 
We have supplied all the necessary details to your agent, therefore we do entertain any question at this juncture. 
Once again, you are required to send to us, your full name, contact address, your phone number and your identity, to reconfirm with the information labeled on the consignment and to avoid releasing goods to a wrong person. 
 
Every question you asked has been answered here already, you must send your personal informstion today as deadline, and you have to send it on this Email: usnyc.cargo-partner. (mailto:usnyc.cargo-partner.jfkairport@usa.com) jfkairport@usa.com 
 And your personal information are well secured on this email account. (mailto:usnyc.cargo-partner.jfkairport@usa.com) 
 
Don't ask any more question untill your information is received, we went through to all the unnecessary questions you were asking your agent yesterday, it is not accepted here. 
Yours faithfully, 
Johnny Chamblee. 
(Cargo Manager), 
Airport Cargo Service 
Email: usnyc.cargo-partner. (mailto:usnyc.cargo-partner.jfkairport@usa.com) jfkairport@usa.com 
 
 
 
 Sent: Monday, March 04, 2024 at 8:53 PM From: "Helen" <ke55343@***.com> To: usnyc.cargo-partner.jfkairport@usa.com Subject: Re: Urgent Notice. 
 
Hello, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the necessary information required for the release of my goods. I appreciate your diligence in ensuring the proper verification process is followed. 
Could you please provide more details on how I can securely send my personal information to reconfirm the proof of ownership of my goods? I want to make sure that everything is handled correctly. 
Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.
Best wishes, 
Helen

subject: Re: Urgent Notice.
body:
Hello Helen,

Thank you for your response. I understand your concerns and appreciate your cooperation in this matter.

To securely send your personal information for the reconfirmation of ownership of your goods, you can simply reply to this email with the required details. Please provide your full name, contact address, phone number, and any identity document that matches the label on your goods.

Rest assured that we take data security seriously, and your information will be handled with utmost care and confidentiality.

Once we receive the necessary details from you, we will proceed with the verification process promptly. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to let me know.

Looking forward to receiving your information soon.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Urgent Notice.
body:
Hello Helen,
I understand your concern about the release of your goods. In order to proceed, we would need some specific information from you to confirm proof of ownership. Could you please provide details such as the invoice number, purchase date, and any other relevant documentation related to the goods in question? This will help us verify your ownership and facilitate the release process.
Thank you for your cooperation, and feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or need assistance.

Best wishes,
Helen
